relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Security is wonderful. there are security boxes places everywhere, they will walk you to your car if you have evening classes as well.
Student government, Women's center, LGBT center, a single mothers group, The Men's center, a whole host of things to do.
Lakeland is especially wonderful for every type of student! It has a little of everything!
I just completed my first semester, the summer, and returning in a few weeks, I have not had the chance yet to be a part of traditions. I plan to explore and join more activities in the fall.

Lakeland is very affordable and The Financial Aid Department is wonderful in providing the proper information to students. There is a scholarships available for athletes as well as others who apply. The bookstore has reasonable prices as well.
Students can find a multitude of activities on and off campus. The Student Activities Center will gladly help find students a club or activity for every student!
Breakers Hall has excellent food all the time! The menu is online for the week. The staff is very nice.
If students study the material, and attend their classes, they will succeed in every class!

Students should take the ACT or SAT ,and come prepared to take your placement tests the week of orientation. Math, English and Writing are essential. Students may want to brush up on these before taking the placement tests for proper placement.

Lakeland Community College is extremely affordable, and you are not just your student identification number. The professors truly care about your academic progress and want you to succeed. The smaller class sizes, create a more learning friendly environment, in order for interaction with professors and instructors.

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot I am learning a lot. I am only taking four classes this semester, but its fairly easy, you just got to have time to fit it all in. Login to rate or flag the reviews Analysse from Jefferson, OH 01/14/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 3 of 33 Categories Comments Campus Safety Campus Safety is there for just that, campus safety. If you have late night classes, and do not want to walk alone to your vehicle, there are call stations located through out the campus. Campus Safety will come and escort you to your vehicle, your safety is their concern.
